description: Upgrade your trading automation with professional MT4 to MT5 migration services in Osu, one of Accra's most vibrant commercial and tech hubs. Located in the heart of Oxford Street's business district, we provide expert MQL4 to MQL5 EA conversion services for traders and developers throughout Osu and Greater Accra. As more international brokers serving the Osu trading community adopt MT5 as their primary platform, migrating your MT4 Expert Advisors ensures access to superior features and long-term platform support. Our MT4 to MT5 upgrade service goes beyond simple syntax conversion—we enhance your EA to fully leverage MT5's advanced capabilities including faster execution speeds, real tick backtesting for unprecedented accuracy, sophisticated order management, economic calendar integration for news-based strategies, and comprehensive multi-asset trading support. Serving Osu's dynamic business community, we understand traders need reliable, high-performance systems that execute flawlessly. Our migration process includes complete code refactoring using MT5's object-oriented programming features, robust error handling implementation, flexible hedge and netting account compatibility, and performance optimization specifically for MT5's architecture. Every migrated EA undergoes rigorous testing to verify 98%+ signal accuracy compared to the original MT4 version, ensuring your trading strategy performs identically while gaining MT5's performance advantages.

process.description: Side-by-side backtesting of MT4 and MT5 versions on identical data sets to confirm 98%+ signal matching, verify logic preservation, and validate performance improvements.

process.description: Receive complete MT5 EA package with source code, detailed migration report, comprehensive documentation, and 30 days of local support from our Osu team.

faq.question: How accurate is the MT4 to MT5 migration for my EA?
faq.answer: We guarantee 98%+ signal accuracy through comprehensive testing. Your migrated MT5 EA will execute the same trading logic and produce identical signals as the original MT4 version, while benefiting from MT5's superior execution speed and order management available through brokers in Osu and across Ghana.

faq.question: What makes MT5 better than MT4 for traders in Osu?
faq.answer: MT5 offers significant advantages: faster trade execution with better fills, more precise backtesting using real tick data instead of interpolated ticks, support for trading multiple asset classes beyond forex, improved position management, economic calendar integration for fundamental analysis, and it represents the future of the MetaTrader platform with ongoing support and development.

faq.question: Can you migrate my EA if I only have the compiled .ex4 file?
faq.answer: While we prefer working with source code (.mq4) for best results, we can decompile and migrate .ex4 files in most cases. However, heavily protected EAs may have limitations. Contact our Osu office for a free assessment of your specific EA file.

faq.question: How long does the migration process take?
faq.answer: Most MT4 to MT5 EA migrations are completed within 2-4 weeks. Simple single-indicator EAs may be ready in 1-2 weeks, while complex multi-strategy systems with numerous custom functions may take 4-6 weeks. We provide a realistic timeline after analyzing your EA during the free consultation.

faq.question: Will I receive the full MQL5 source code?
faq.answer: Yes! You receive complete ownership of both the compiled .ex5 file and the full MQL5 source code (.mq5). This ensures you can make future modifications, understand the implementation, and maintain full control over your trading automation system.

faq.question: Does the migrated EA work with hedging and netting accounts?
faq.answer: We configure your EA for your preferred account type during migration. MT5 supports both hedging mode (like MT4, allowing multiple positions on the same pair) and netting mode (single position per symbol). We discuss your requirements and trading style to implement the optimal configuration.

faq.question: Can you add MT5-specific features during migration?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Beyond basic conversion, we can enhance your EA with MT5-exclusive features like economic calendar integration, multi-threading for parallel processing, depth of market analysis, or advanced position management. These enhancements are quoted separately based on complexity and development time required.

faq.question: Do you provide support after delivery in Osu?
faq.answer: Yes, all migrations include 30 days of free support for bug fixes and minor adjustments. Being based in Osu provides convenient local communication. We also offer ongoing maintenance plans for long-term support, updates, and optimization services.
